title: Modern control of weeds
brief_description: The dangers of allowing weeds to grow unchecked, such as bush fires and obscured road signs, points to the need for an efficient and economical weedicide such as “Vorax”. Spraying evenly and thoroughly keeps railway lines, drains, kerbsides, tarmacs, footpaths, and cemetries clear for a whole season, without harm to nearby trees or children.
